Method Detail

changeLanguageTo

public static void changeLanguageTo(java.lang.String NewLang)
Changing the application language to: NewLang => "DE", "EN", "ES", "IT" etc. is equal to the end phrase after the prefix "LANG_". E.g. "LANG_EN" needs "EN" as parameter

translate

public static java.lang.String translate(java.lang.String DE_Exp)
Translate one Expression, which is based on the German expression

getLanguagesHeaderInGerman

public static java.lang.String getLanguagesHeaderInGerman(java.lang.String LangHeader)
Translate the already known language-headers (e. g. 'LANG_EN') and give them an proper German expression.

Saving the file 'dictionary.csv' to the folder properties
